title: BONUS - How to Find Little Moments of Delight with Bob Goff
description: We all could use more joy today - more Bob Goff! Join us today as we talk about how we can find delight and delight in others during this season. It might be more difficult… but I believe it’s possible. Find Bob’s book Love Does here: https://www.amazon.com/Love-Does-Discover-Secretly-Incredible/dp/B0083Q5364/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=love+does&qid=1586377824&sr=8-1
itunes:author: Jennie Allen
